metadata.reset: USE THE RESET PROCEDURE ONLY WHEN THE PRIMARY CONTROLLER IS MISSING OR INOPERABLE. Start the Product Reset process by selecting Reset Controller/Start New Installation from the main menu or by selecting the Reset Controller/Start New Installation button on the main toolbar. This is used to set the Pro.zwi to Defaults. The Pro.zwi will become the primary controller, all Z-Wave devices will be removed from its memory and a new HomeID will be assigned
